Reviews.Title: Not a Cell Phone Watch
Reviews.Author: Xevil
Reviews.Content: I haven't been able to get this watch to work on any cellular bands. Cool design, and it takes decent pics and video. But it's definitely not a cell phone watch. Maybe in China in one of their bands, but not the US.

ProductInfo.Features:
Support 3G SIM Card
GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHz
Resolution: 240 x 240 pixels, 1.6 inches
Super Sensitive Touch Screen
1.3Mega Pixels High Definition Camera
ProductInfo.Name: E4worlds Black 1.6" TFT Touch Screen Unlocked Cell Phone Watch Hidden Camera DVR Jave Tw818
